name: Finding Purpose in Life
description: A 7-day reading plan to help you discover your purpose and live a life of meaning and fulfillment.

readings.why_selected: To understand our identity in Christ and how it relates to our purpose in life.
To understand the concept of being a new creation in Christ.
To understand the importance of discovering our passions and gifts.
To understand how our gifts can be used to serve others.

days.outline: Understanding God's Plan for Your Life

readings.why_selected: To understand how God's plan for our lives is connected to our purpose.
To understand the importance of seeking God's will in our lives.
To understand how to overcome obstacles and fears that hold us back from our purpose.
To understand the importance of trusting God in difficult times.

days.outline: Living a Life of Purpose and Meaning

readings.why_selected: To understand how to live a life of purpose and meaning.
To understand the importance of serving others in our purpose.
To understand how to stay focused and motivated in our purpose.
To understand the importance of perseverance in our purpose.
To understand how to live a life of fulfillment in our purpose.
To understand the importance of trusting God in our purpose.
